revision.comment: removed 'incoming links' tag, no long relevant
revision.text:
'''Berezan''' may refer to:
* [[Berezan, Kiev Oblast]], a city in Ukraine * [[Berezan Island]], an island in the Black Sea * [[Berezan' Runestone]], discovered in 1905 * [[Berezan Estuary]], open estuary on the northern coast of the Black Sea
==People== * [[Jennifer Berezan]] (born 1961), Canadian singer-songwriter, producer, and activist * [[Perry Berezan]] (born 1964), Canadian ice hockey centre
{{disambiguation|geo|surname}}
